articles.description: Freddie Boorman, 13, from Gloucestershire, protected his younger siblings while his father was attacked on the front lawn in a vicious last October. Freddie has been honoured for his incredible bravery.
articles.content:
A 13-year-old boy who saved his siblings' lives while his father was stabbed to death by a knife-wielding attacker yards away has been awarded for his bravery.
